##Problem 1

Creating a data frame for question 1:

```{r}
library(tidyverse)

hw1_p1_df = tibble(
  random_sample = runif(10, 0, 5),
  vec_logical = random_sample > 2,
  vec_char = c("a", "b", "c", "d", "e", "f", "g", "h", "i", "j"),
  vec_factor = factor(c(vec_char))
  
)

```
